title: It's the Bear!
description: "The suspense is just scary enough for preschoolers, who will love the pie-in-the-sky ending in which both the bear and Eddie's mother get their just desserts." - PUBLISHERS WEEKLYThe last time Eddie went for a walk in the woods, he had the biggest surprise of his life. There was a bear the size of a house in there! Now Eddie's mom is in the mood to picnic and she insists that the only bear in the woods is Eddie's teddy, Freddie. But when Mom rushes home to get the blueberry pie she forgot, leaving Eddie to wait in the woods all alone well, can you guess who shows up?
author: Jez Alborough
